title: Ravenborn LeBlanc Missing Q Sound and Visual Effect

embed.description: League of Legends Ravenborn LeBlanc Skin. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Shows off Animations and Ability Effects of LeBlanc on their Ravenborn Skin. All footage was taken in game.

body:
So with the reverted LeBlanc, I tested her out in Practice Tool just to make sure that she is actually missing something out and it turns out, her Q - Sigil of Malice mark is missing a sound effect for when the mark hasn't been triggered and lasts throughout its duration. In the video, you can clearly hear it. Also the mark is missing a visual specifically those lights that are going outward around the mark.

It's just a bit irritating because I have mained her for years, and I still do, and I always hear her sound effects and I would notice right away when something is off.

Please re add those and thank you :)

replies.body:
Thank you for taking this into consideration! Also one more thing about LeBlanc. Apparently with her passive Mirror Image, it used to produce sounds for both instances (When she goes into invisibility) and (When she comes out of stealth and deploys the clone)

Right now it's only playing for the invisibility. Could you please perhaps once again forward it to the sound team and possibly restore the second one? Thank you once again! :)

> [{quoted}](name=SylvanasWrunner,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=NAwvnFJh,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-20T10:15:11.565+0000)
>
> Thank you for taking this into consideration! Also one more thing about LeBlanc. Apparently with her passive Mirror Image, it used to produce sounds for both instances (When she goes into invisibility) and (When she comes out of stealth and deploys the clone)
> 
> Right now it's only playing for the invisibility. Could you please perhaps once again forward it to the sound team and possibly restore the second one? Thank you once again! :)

Sure thing. Just to be super transparent, these may not be prioritized in the next patch as they don't affect gameplay, but the goal is within the next few!

**EDIT:** Logged everything and have 'em assigned out.

Hello, I just want to know if there is any update on these missing sounds. They've been persisting for awhile now. I know it's not a big of an issue, but it is still a good part of what makes this skin unique. Thank you!

Funny you mention this, I was talking to a dev about these today about getting fixes for these, since I saw them still open. The team's had other issues that have taken higher priority, but they're still wanted to fix these. No update to share in regards to an ETA at the moment.
